---
title: "View documentation templates"
date: last-modified
---

Learn how to view the structure and configuration of existing documentation templates on the ValidMind Platform. 

## Prerequisites

To view templates, you must be a registered user on the ValidMind Platform.

::: {.callout-important}
To configure templates, you must hold the `Customer Admin` role. 
:::

## Steps

1. [Log in to the ValidMind UI]({{< var vm_ui >}}).

2. In the left sidebar, click **Settings** and then [**Templates**](https://app.prod.validmind.ai/settings/templates).

2. Click on one of the available templates. 

   In the page that opens, you can view information about the template, such as: 

   - Name and description of the template
   - Version of the templates
   - Sections in the template and how they are structured
   - Guidelines associated with each section 
   - Metrics from the developer framework that feed into the template
